article.title: Remote communications work
article.label: Availability
article.intro: Read more about online availability of project participants (e.g., engineers)
article.description: Project manager and project team are available online and regularly offline.
article.keywords: Project communications, project team communications, communication management plan

text.p: During the project execution, you communicate with project manager and project team by email, phone or an instant messaging tool (Skype, YahooIM, MSN or GoogleTalk).
We work 5 days a week from Monday till Friday. The project manager is online from 6:00am-12:00pm EST (6 hours daily).

concepts.c1: Project manager sends Daily Reports to you by email
concepts.c2: Incremental delivery increases your business satisfaction
concepts.c3: Schedule defines exact Milestones and Iterations
